author: cmlenz
msg: Fix the config HTTP API for the changed JSON representation, remove the POST handling for setting option values (leaving only PUT), and add a GET /_config/section handler that allows enumerating the options in a section.

author: cmlenz
msg: Remove obsolete json_term_changes branch, which has been merged into trunk in r690668.

author: cmlenz
msg: Merged json_term_changes branch back into trunk.

author: etnu
msg: This moves all of the authentication handling code to org.apache.shindig.auth.
OAuth handlers remain in the social package.

Note that right now, only the social API is using the filters. There is no binding for auth tokens in the default filter. Since overrides module isn't available until Guice 2.0, we will provide a separate auth module that can be used when running a standalone gadget renderer.

author: jalkanen
msg: Updated Doc: reference to point at 2.8.
